paper_abstract: This paper is concerned with the mean-square stability of the Split-Step Backward Euler method for stochastic delayed Hopfield neural networks. The sufficient conditions to guarantee the mean-square stability of the Split-Step Backward Euler method are given. Moreover, an example of the comparison of our method with the Euler-Maruyama method is used to show the superiority of our method.
paper_title: Stability in the numerical simulation of stochastic delayed Hopfield neural networks
